title: Seducing The Club Prez
description:
Description :
        'Asura x Flame-- You don't need to get the context to read. Either way, I hope you have a fun time and a Happy New Year!In a school where the hierarchy is based on your popularity on a virtual platform, Flame, like any other student, strives to be the most popular in his club. However, Asura has held that position for a long time and won't be overtaken anytime soon."I'll get his attention... by seducing him!"After all, what could go wrong?'
